RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 1 1 1/16M Dirt CR: 64. Claiming Purse 10000. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE JANUARY 14. Three Year Olds, 122 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MANI PEDI tracked the early pace along the inside, continued its inside bid into the upper stretch, finished well in the lane while angling out deep stretch and was clear late under strong pressure. WICKED T showed good early speed to set the early pace, veered out sharply just past the eighth pole, forced Londonderry to take up, a stewards inquiry an jockey objection was filed by Londonderry and stewards disqualified Wicked T and placed third for interference in the stretch run. LONDONDERRY was off a step slow, settled off the early going, moved up from the outside in the lane, forced to take up past the eighth pole, shifted in and kept on gamely to the wire. ARCTICA prompt two wide down the backstretch and weakened in the drive. JUSTIN TIME stalked the pace from the outside of foes and faded. MISS MORENO was void of early speed and trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Mani Pedi
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked inside, inside upper stretch, drove clear

ENTRY.NAME: Londonderry
ENTRY.OWNER: Cirexis Stable and Rodriguez Miguel A
ENTRY.COMMENT: off step slow, outside, took up 1/8, shifted in, game

ENTRY.NAME: dq-Wicked T
ENTRY.COMMENT: good early speed, set pace, veered out 1/8, bothered foe

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 2 1M Turf CR: 77. Claiming Purse 15400. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 122 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since June 14 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since May 14 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $6,250, if for $6,000, allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $5,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) Preference to horses with the most starts at Penn National since May 31st 2022. (If deemed inadvisable by management to run this race over the turf course it will be run on the main track at One Mile. If more than 10 horses remain it will be run at One Mile and Seventy Yards.).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: COLOR FORCE showed good early speed to set the early pace and held gamely to be clear under strong handling. ALONG THE WAY stalked the pace along the inside down the backstretch, raced near the rail in the stretch and rallied for the place position. HIDDEN SPRINGS tracked two deep from the outside of rival and kept on willingly to the wire. LADY BREXIT stalked the pace three deep outside of foes, raced four to five wide into the upper stretch and raced even late with no closing run. MIKEY'S JEWEL dropped back early, raced near the inside past the quarter pole, angled out and had no late rally. DANCE A LITTLE JIG dropped back mid pack early on, raced from the outside in the lane and lacked a bid. GIMME'S GOLDENGIRL was unhurried early and failed to respond. HIT A HOMER HONEY raced five wide into the upper stretch and never threatened.

ENTRY.NAME: Dance a Little Jig
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, outside lane, lacked bid

ENTRY.NAME: Mikey's Jewel
ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed, inside 1/4, angled, no rally

ENTRY.NAME: Hit a Homer Honey
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, 5wd upper stretch, no bid

ENTRY.NAME: Lady Brexit
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked 3wd outside foes, 4-5wd upper stretch, even late

ENTRY.NAME: Color Force
ENTRY.COMMENT: good early speed, set pace, held gamely, driving,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 3 1M 70Y Turf CR: 82. Starter Optional Claiming Purse 19000. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $16,000 OR LESS AND WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $16,000 AND WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 122 lb s.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since June 14 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since May 14 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $16,000 (Races Where Entered For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) Preference to horses with the mo st starts at Penn National since May 31st 2022. (If deemed inadvisable by management to run this race over the turf course, it will be run on the main track at One Mile Seventy Yards.).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SHUTUP AND HANG ON stalked the pace along the inside, continued its inside bid into the stretch, angled to the outside of rivals near the eighth pole and edged up late under strong handling. CHELICHNA stalked the pace from the outside of foes, moved up three wide near the quarter pole to challenge, led deep stretch and just missed in a game effort. AFRICAN ANGEL settled off the early pace, moved up four to five wide in the stretch and finished willingly to the wire. IMNOTONETOCOMPLAIN showed good early speed to set the early pace, had a narrow lead near the eighth pole and faltered in the final stages. SAYYIDA AL HURRA raced near the back of the pack early, checked along the inside near the three eighths pole and never threatened. DALLAS was slow early on and never threatened. HOLD ME CLOSER tracked two deep and tired readily.

ENTRY.NAME: Imnotonetocomplain
ENTRY.COMMENT: good early speed, set pace, faltered 1/8

ENTRY.NAME: Shutup and Hang On
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked, inside, angled 1/8, edged up, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Sayyida Al Hurra
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, checked 3/8, inside, no bid

ENTRY.NAME: African Angel
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, 4-5 wide bid, willingly

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 88. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 28900. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, OR PENNSYLVANIA BRED OR CLAIMING PRICE $25,000 OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 122 lbs.; Olde r, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since June 14 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since May 14 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $25,000 (Races Where Entered For $25,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BELLA PRIMA tracked the early leader from the inside, took a narrow lead near the eighth pole, dug in and proved best under all out pressure. KNICKERSINATWIST stalked the pace, moved up three to four wide and finished gamely to the wire. STAND BY YOU void of early speed, moved up four wide between rivals and gained ground well late. DATE NIGHT KISSES showed good early foot to set the early pace and weakened in the drive. MOONSAFE raced mid pack early on, was along the outside of foes in the stretch and had no late rally. QUEEN'S DREAM dropped back early and failed to respond.

ENTRY.NAME: Bella Prima
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked inside, dug in, all out

ENTRY.NAME: Knickersinatwist
ENTRY.OWNER: Short Straw Stable Jackson Stephen G and Jackson Debbie

ENTRY.NAME: Moonsafe
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, outside lane, no rally

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 5 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 88. Allowance Purse 28000. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, OR PENNSYLVANIA BRED. Three Year Olds, 122 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since June 14 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since May 14 Allowed 4 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $16,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SHATTER ME showed good early foot from the inside to set the pace and held gamely to prove best under strong handling. AMEN SYLVIA was off slowly, raced along the inside past the quarter pole, angled four deep and rallied for the place position. MISS CONVEYOR stalked the early pace, raced two to three wide around the far turn and kept on to the wire. ONTHISHARVESTMOON raced mid pack early on, was near the inside around the far turn through the stretch and had no final winning bid. EARLY FROST was slow early on, raced from the outside in the lane and had no late rally. POSITIVE FORCE was coaxed along early and faded.

ENTRY.NAME: Onthisharvestmoon
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, inside, no final bid

ENTRY.NAME: Early Frost
ENTRY.OWNER: IBB Thoroughbred and Stem Brandon Paul
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, outside lane, no rally

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 6 1 1/16M Dirt CR: 81. Claiming Purse 11800. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE JANUARY 14 OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 122 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since June 14 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since May 14 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Races Where Entered For $4,000 Or Less Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ADY'S MUNNY showed good early speed to set the early pace and drew off to be well clear under steady pressure. PATTY'S BOY raced off the early going, moved up from the inside past the quarter pole but was no match for the winner in the drive. PRATT stalked the pace along the inside, shifted five wide into the upper stretch and kept on to the wire. CHARGING LION tracked three deep and faded. VISHNU was unhurried early, raced along the inside past the quarter pole, shifted out through the stretch and never threaened. HE CAME TRUE stalked the pace and failed to sustain a bid while racing from the outside.

ENTRY.NAME: He Came True
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, failed to sustain bid,

ENTRY.NAME: Vishnu
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, inside 1/4, shifted out, no bid

ENTRY.NAME: Pratt
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked inside, 5wd upper stretch, kept on

ENTRY.NAME: Ady's Munny
ENTRY.COMMENT: good early speed, set pace, drew off, well clear, driving,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 7 6F Dirt CR: 72. Claiming Purse 14400. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 122 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since June 14 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000, if for $9,000, allowed 2 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: POLSAR stalked the pace early pace, moved up three wide through the far turn and finished determined to prove best under all out pressure. TRIPLE TITOS dropped back early on, moved up three wide between rivals in the stretch and rallied the place position. CAJUN OCCASION settled off the earl going, moved up four to five wide and closed in well late. NORTHERN SPY vied two deep for the early lead and faltered in the drive. SPELLED WELL pressed the pace from the inside and faded. WICKED IRISHMAN stalked the pace early on, raced five wide into the upper stretch and was empty in the stretch run.
